agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Business & Commerce TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Thursday, May 2, 2019 PLACE: E1.016 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Kelly Hancock SB 309 Rodríguez Relating to the fiduciary status of a directed trust advisor. HB 1535 Flynn | et al. SP: Nichols Relating to the continuation and functions of the State Securities Board. HB 1540 Thompson, Senfronia | et al. SP: Hall Relating to the continuation and functions of the Texas Funeral Service Commission; authorizing fees. HB 1757 Lucio III SP: Schwertner Relating to the authority of an insured to select a pharmacist under the insured's health insurance policy. HB 1894 Goldman SP: Hancock Relating to the imposition of an administrative penalty and the repeal of the criminal penalty for a violation of the interior designers licensing law. HB 2325 Metcalf | et al. SP: Hancock Relating to providing information and communication regarding and during a disaster. HB 2779 Wray SP: Rodríguez Relating to the exemption for certain savings plans from attachment, execution, or other seizure for a creditor's claim. HB 2790 Goldman SP: Johnson Relating to prima facie evidence of the intent to sell certain alcoholic beverages. HB 3441 Lucio III SP: Schwertner Relating to reimbursement under certain health benefit plans for certain services and procedures performed by pharmacists. Pending business Public testimony will be limited to 3 minutes. If submitting written testimony, please provide 20 copies to the committee clerk with your name and bill number on each copy. You may register for this hearing using the Senate kiosk located in the extension hallways or by going to http://swrs.
